atbat.des: Garrett Jones singles on a ground ball to right fielder Angel Pagan.
Pedro Alvarez triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Carlos Beltran. Garrett Jones scores.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Raul Valdes; Pedro Alvarez is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .747 OPS against them and .717 against everything else.

atbat.des: John Bowker doubles (5) on a sharp fly ball to center fielder Carlos Beltran. Pedro Alvarez scores.

pitch.cc: Raul Valdes battled back from 3-0 to retire John Bowker.

atbat.des: Ronny Cedeno pops out to pitcher Raul Valdes.
Chris Snyder walks.

pitch.cc: Raul Valdes is trying to tie up Chris Snyder with fastballs inside, where Chris Snyder hits .278.

atbat.des: Paul Maholm out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman David Wright to second baseman Ruben Tejada. John Bowker to 3rd. Chris Snyder to 2nd.
Andrew McCutchen singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Angel Pagan. John Bowker scores. Chris Snyder scores. Andrew McCutchen to 2nd on the throw.

pitch.cc: Raul Valdes is trying to tie up Andrew McCutchen with fastballs inside, where Andrew McCutchen hits .356.

atbat.des: Jose Tabata grounds out softly, pitcher Raul Valdes to first baseman Ike Davis.

pitch.cc: Raul Valdes has Pirates batters hitting the ball into the ground so far.

atbat.des: Angel Pagan pops out to shortstop Ronny Cedeno.

pitch.cc: Paul Maholm went back to the two-seam fastball even though Angel Pagan hit for a single last time up.
Paul Maholm has been getting the ball up so far; he has allowed 15 HR in 167.2 IP this year.

atbat.des: Carlos Beltran singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Jose Tabata.
David Wright singles on a line drive to right fielder John Bowker. Carlos Beltran to 2nd.
Ike Davis doubles (31) on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Andrew McCutchen, deflected by second baseman Neil Walker. Carlos Beltran scores. David Wright to 3rd.
Nick Evans walks.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Mike Hessman replaces Henry Blanco.

atbat.des: Mike Hessman singles on a line drive to right fielder John Bowker. David Wright scores. Ike Davis to 3rd. Nick Evans to 2nd.

Ruben Tejada reaches on force attempt, missed catch error by catcher Chris Snyder, assist to third baseman Pedro Alvarez. Ike Davis scores. Nick Evans scores. Mike Hessman to 3rd. Ruben Tejada to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Paul Maholm shows faith in Chris Snyder by throwing the slider in the dirt.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Joaquin Arias replaces Raul Valdes.

atbat.des: Joaquin Arias reaches on fielding error by shortstop Ronny Cedeno. Mike Hessman scores.
Jose Reyes grounds out softly to first baseman Garrett Jones. Ruben Tejada to 3rd. Joaquin Arias to 2nd.
Angel Pagan singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Andrew McCutchen. Ruben Tejada scores. Joaquin Arias scores.

pitch.cc: Paul Maholm went back to the two-seam fastball even though Angel Pagan hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Carlos Beltran singles on a line drive to right fielder John Bowker. Angel Pagan to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Chan Ho Park replaces Paul Maholm, batting 9th.

atbat.des: David Wright walks. Angel Pagan to 3rd. Carlos Beltran to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Chan Ho Park went back to the slider even though David Wright hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Ike Davis flies out to right fielder John Bowker.

pitch.cc: Chan Ho Park shows faith in Chris Snyder by throwing the slider in the dirt.
Chan Ho Park is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Andy Fletcher.
